raadtools
  • Reference
  • Articles

Load metadata and location of files of sea ice data products.

This function loads the latest cache of stored files for ice products.

icefiles(time.resolution = c("daily", "monthly"), product = c("nsidc",
  "amsr"), hemisphere = c("south", "north"), ..., extension = "hdf")

Arguments

time.resolution

daily or monthly files?
product

choice of sea ice product, see readice
hemisphere

north or south
...

reserved for future use, currently ignored
extension

default for product "amsr" is "hdf" but can be "tif" , extension = "hdf"

Value

data.frame of file and date

Examples

## Not run: ------------------------------------
# icf <- icefiles(time.resolution = "monthly")
# icf[which.min((as.Date("1995-01-01") + runif(1, -4000, 4000)) - as.Date(icf$date), ]
## ---------------------------------------------
